XMBC and Hulu

I recently installed “XBMC Live,” the Ubuntu-based standalone Linux distribution of XBMC (a set-top box-like media application). If you’re familiar with Boxee, Boxee is based off XBMC.

Getting Hulu up and running on XBMC isn’t the easiest, and there aren’t too many good guides available out there. Steps to get Hulu up and running follow. Continue reading
